problem.p: Two small particles of mass m1 and mass m2 attract each other with a force that varies at the inverse cube of their separation. At time ti, m1 has a velocity of magnitude v1 directed towards m2 , which is at rest a distance d away. At time tf, the particles collide. How far does m1 travel in time interval tf-ti?
Type m1 for m1, m2 for m2, v1 for v1, ti for ti and tf for tf.
